account.bindWechatDesc: Open WeChat to scan QR code for WeChat binding
account.unbindDesc: After unbinding, you will not be able to log in with {typeText} account. Confirm unbinding?

messages.securityDescription:
We recommend updating your password regularly. A high-security password helps protect your account better. Password requirements:
- At least 2 of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, or special symbols.
- The minimum length is 6 characters or more.
messages.mobileDescription: You have bound mobile number {mobile}, which can be used for login, password recovery, receiving service SMS notifications, and other functions.
messages.emailDescription: You have bound email {email}, which can be used for login, receiving service notifications, and other functions.
messages.unbindMobileDesc: You haven't bound a mobile number yet. After binding, it can be used for login, password recovery, receiving service SMS notifications, and other functions.
messages.unbindEmailDesc: You haven't bound an email yet. After binding, it can be used for login, receiving service notifications, and other functions.
messages.mobileBindDescription: Verification passed, please verify the mobile number to be bound
messages.emailBoundDescription: After binding email, it can be used for login and receiving messages. Duplicate emails cannot be bound.
messages.emailBindDescription: Verification passed, please verify the email to be bound
messages.modalDescription: You are performing a sensitive operation. Please verify your identity before continuing. After successfully changing {typeIfy}, you will not be able to log in with the old {typeIfy}.
messages.updateSuccessDescription: After successfully changing the password, you will be logged out to the login page and need to log in again.
messages.notTheSame: New password and current password cannot be the same
messages.systemPasswordStrength: System supports password length of 6-50 characters
messages.passwordRules: At least contains two combinations of numbers and letters, supports numbers, letters, and special symbols
messages.theSame: Confirm password and new password must be consistent

token.tokenDescription: The currently generated access token (access_token) is a 'user' access token. User access tokens have the same resource and data permissions as users. API requests carrying user access tokens can access protected user resources and data without exposing user passwords. For user security, please set a short expiration time whenever possible; all access operations and audit information of user access tokens will be associated with the corresponding user.
token.expireTimeDescription: Expiration time (defaults to 30 days if not specified)
token.addTokenDescription: Each user is limited to adding 3 tokens
token.copiedTokenDescription: Token 'Test' has been created. You will not be able to see the generated Token again, please ensure you 'Copy Token' now.
token.addTokenTotal: Each user can add up to {maxNum} access tokens, {total} tokens have been added

placeholder.tokenNameLength: Please enter a token name within 100 characters

messages.addTokenTotal: {total} tokens have been added, supporting up to {maxNum} access tokens
messages.confirmDelete: Confirm deletion of this access token?
